slim thug ft l.e.$ - halloween night    i got my mask on-- trick or treat my pistol out; its time to eat.. its haunted out here in these streets-- goons lurkin tryna creep... tryna see if a nigga slippin: cappin hard with no bodyguard.. rappin hard but the nigga fraud so when i see him ima pull his card scary nigga... talkin tough.... im bout to wire yo mouth up... im bout to fire yo house up... call the laws i dont give a fuck its halloween-- niggas dyin-- mask on-- shots flyin-- you can hear mom and kids cryin-- im takin everything good i find; better brake yoself dont make yoself-- end up on the breakin news im breakin fools and breakin rules fuck payin dues im takin dues... makin fools lay it down at first sight of this ak this halloween fuck trick-or-treat... you can have what i dont take....
